texts.name: Broghild
texts.biography: Broghild's grandfather first tamed wild Wyverns for use as flying scouts above the Tatalian Lowlands.  The secrets of handling these creatures was passed to Broghild's father, and eventually to him.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Wyverns or Wyvern Monarchs for each level attained after 6th level.
specialty.name: Wyverns
